(Depracted) Module: make_mosaic_image
*************************************

This module contains functionality to create mosaics with the Miriad task
*linmos*.

**Note: This is incorrect for the continuum images created by Apercal.
Also, the mosaic module in Apercal takes care of creating mosaics.**

Reference
---------

.. automodule:: mosaic.make_mosaic_image
   :members:
